T02D1783:285b-1: aa tsa l'a bhis ma ya: su ra t'a bhi dh'a na:/
T02D1783:285b-3: mi g-yo ba'i mngon par rtogs pa rab tu dga' bar mdon par brjod pa /
T02D1783:285b-4: dpal gtum chen drag po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1783:285b-5: dpal dbang dpa' bo'i tshogs la phyag byas nas //
T02D1783:285b-6: rang gi rgyud dang gzhung gzhan mthong ba las //
T02D1783:285b-7: dpal ldan drag chen sgrub thabs zhes bya ba //
T02D1783:285b-8: de dag las phyung 'dir ni bri bar bya //
T02D1783:285b-9: dang po re zhig sngags pa sangs rgyas thams cad
T02D1783:285b-10: kyi sku gsum po 'di nyid du mngon sum du
T02D1783:285b-12: yang dag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bslabs pa /
T02D1783:285b-13: rdo rdo rje bla ma mnyes par byas nas dkyil 'khor du zhugs shing dbang bskur ba /
T02D1783:285b-14: yang dag par rjes su gnang ba /
T02D1783:285b-15: rgyud thos nas zung du 'jug pa'i de kho na nyid la mkhas pa /
T02D1783:285b-16: snying rje chen po can sems can thams cad kyi don la brtson pa'i blos /
T02D1783:285b-17: dpal drag chen gtum po bsgom par 'dod pas /
T02D1783:285b-18: yid dang rjes su mthun zhing nye bar 'tshe ba
T02D1783:285b-19: thams cad dang bral ba'i gnas su bde ba'i stan
T02D1783:285b-20: la 'dug pa'am / yang na rdo rjes sam /
T02D1783:285b-21: 'byin pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis 'di la 'dug pa ni stan te zhes rab ma mchog gi lus so //
T02D1783:285b-23: de nas bdud rtsi lnga'i ril du bar bcug nas tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1783:285b-24: de la sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa
T02D1783:285b-25: lta bur brtse ba bde ba nye bar sgrub pa'i
T02D1783:285b-26: rnam pa ni byams pa chen po'o //
T02D1783:285b-27: rnam par rtog pa'i chu gter du bying zhing skyabs
T02D1783:285b-28: med pa'i sems can thams cad sdug bsngal dang sdug
T02D1783:285b-29: bsngal gyi rgyu las 'don par 'dod pa'i rang bzhin
T02D1783:285b-31: ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i mi g-yo ba'i sgrub
T02D1783:285b-32: pa'i thabs nye bar bstan pa las thun mong dang
T02D1783:285b-33: mchog gi bde ba dang ldan pas yongs su tshim
T02D1783:286a-2: 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyi gnyen por lam nye bar sgrub pa'i rnam pa ni btang snyoms so //
T02D1783:286a-3: de nas rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid 'chad par 'gyur ba'i kha dog dang /
T02D1783:286a-5: dbyibs can gyi mi g-yo ba'i rang gi snying gar
T02D1783:286a-6: padma dang zla ba dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i
T02D1783:286a-7: h'um yig sngon po las spros pa'i ye shes lnga'i
T02D1783:286a-8: 'od zer rnams kyis mtha' yas pa'i 'jig rten gyi
T02D1783:286a-9: khams rnams snang bar byas nas /
T02D1783:286a-10: bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
T02D1783:286a-12: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang mdun gyi nam mkhar spyan drangs nas tshogs la bltas te /
T02D1783:286a-13: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon dang nam mkha' mdzod
T02D1783:286a-14: kyi ting nge 'dzin las byung ba'i mchod pa'i rdzas
T02D1783:286a-15: phyag na bsnams pa de'i 'khor lor gnas pa'i gti
T02D1783:286a-16: mug rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma
T02D1783:286a-17: rnams kyis mngon par mchod nas /
T02D1783:286a-18: bla na med pa'i mchod pa bdun gyi tshigs su bcad pa brjod do //
T02D1783:286a-19: bcas pa dang ni rang bzhin gyis //
T02D1783:286a-20: sdig pa bdag gis gang bgyis dang //
T02D1783:286a-21: bgyis stsal gang yang yi rang ba //
T02D1783:286a-22: de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so //
T02D1783:286a-23: sangs rgyas de sras 'phags rnams kyis //
T02D1783:286a-24: bsags pa'i bsod nams la yi rang //
T02D1783:286a-25: chos dang tshogs kyi mchog bcas pa'i //
T02D1783:286a-26: sangs rgyas rnams la skyabs su mchi //
T02D1783:286a-27: dpal sdug chos ni ston pa yi //
T02D1783:286a-28: sgra dbyangs sgrogs shing bzhugs su gsol //
T02D1783:286a-29: bdag cag rnams kyi rang gi lus //
T02D1783:286a-30: khyad par du ni dbul bar bgyi //
T02D1783:286a-31: bsod nams gang bsags de dag ni //
T02D1783:286a-32: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo'o //
T02D1783:286a-33: dpal ldan gtum po'i dbang phyug tu //
T02D1783:286a-34: gyur nas bdag gis 'gro phan bgyi //
T02D1783:286a-35: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa'i sku
T02D1783:286a-36: dang gsung dang thugs la mngon par dad pas phyag
T02D1783:286a-37: 'tshal te / ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin du lhag par mos pas /
T02D1783:286a-38: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sv'a bh'a wa a'tma ko& ham /
T02D1783:286a-39: zhes pa'i sngags brjod par bya'o zhes pa ni sbyor ba'o //
T02D1783:286a-40: de nas nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor du gnas pa'i bdag nyid kyi sha dang /
T02D1783:286a-42: khrag la sogs pa dang bral ba /
T02D1783:286a-43: 'od zer dkar po'i phung po lta bu'i rdo rje
T02D1783:286b-0: sems dpa' zhi ba @286b chen po zhal gcig phyag
T02D1783:286b-1: gnyis pa phyag gi padma ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag
T02D1783:286b-2: rgya can / ral pa'i cod pan dang ldan pa /
T02D1783:286b-3: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis 'dzin zhing /
T02D1783:286b-4: dpe byad brgyad cus mdzes pa /
T02D1783:286b-6: zla ba'i gdan la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs par blta bar bya'o //
T02D1783:286b-8: dri med dang ba'i shel bzhin du //
T02D1783:286b-9: rang lus rnam par bsgom par bya //
T02D1783:286b-10: zhes so zhes pa rjes su rnal 'byor ro //
T02D1783:286b-11: de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid du brtan
T02D1783:286b-12: par gyur pa'i snying gar nyi ma dang zla ba
T02D1783:286b-13: kha sbyar ba'i dbus su h'um yig sngon po de
T02D1783:286b-14: yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje h'um gis mtshan
T02D1783:286b-15: pa / nyi ma la sogs pa de dag thams cad zla ba'i gzugs brnyan du bsams nas /
T02D1783:286b-16: de las 'thon pa'i dpal gtum po'i dbang phyug 'chad
T02D1783:286b-17: par 'gyur ba shin tu drag po'i gzugs can mdun
T02D1783:286b-18: du skad cig tsam gyis bltas nas /
T02D1783:286b-19: slar yang rang la bcug ste /
T02D1783:286b-20: rang nyid de lta bu'i gtum po'i dbang phyug rab tu gtum mar bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1783:286b-22: sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan las byung ba'i //
T02D1783:286b-23: dkyil 'khor dbang po rnam par bsgom //
T02D1783:286b-25: de nas bdag nyid khros pa'i nyams can gdug pa'i
T02D1783:286b-26: bgegs kyi tshogs thams cad ral gris skrag par mdzad
T02D1783:286b-27: cing h'um h'um tratkhe da ya /
T02D1783:286b-28: h'um h'um h'um tratkhe da ya bho zhes 'don par mdzad cing /
T02D1783:286b-30: phyag g-yon par gnas pa'i rdo rje zhags pas bcings nas /
T02D1783:286b-31: g-yas kyi phyag na gnas pa'i ral gris h'um h'um
T02D1783:286b-32: phat phat ces gsungs shing bdag nyid myos pa'i sil
T02D1783:286b-33: snyan bzhin du / bgegs kyi tshogs la h'a h'a'i sgra sgrogs shing kha cig ni sha'o //
T02D1783:286b-34: de nas bgegs med pa'i sems kyis dga' ba dang
T02D1783:286b-35: bcas pa'i rdo rje zhags pa las skyes pa'i 'bar
T02D1783:286b-37: 'bar du 'jug pa'i phur bu bgegs rnams kyi spyi
T02D1783:286b-38: bor bsams nas ral gri las byung ba'i rdo rje
T02D1783:286b-40: klad pa nas brtsams te gsang ba'i padma'i bar du thon zhing /
T02D1783:286b-41: phur bu'i sngags brjod par bya'o //
T02D1783:287a-0: phur bus btab nas phyogs bcu'i khron par gzhug par @287a * //
T02D1783:287a-3: aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na /
T02D1783:287a-4: gha gha gh'a ta ya sarba dushte ndro pondr'an na /
T02D1783:287a-5: sa pa ri w'a ra na /
T02D1783:287a-6: k'i la ya k'i la ya h'um phat /
T02D1783:287a-8: aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na /
T02D1783:287a-9: gha gha gh'a ta ya sarba dushta ya m'a na sa pa ri w'a r'a na /
T02D1783:287a-10: k'i la ya k'i la ya h'um phat /
T02D1783:287a-12: aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na /
T02D1783:287a-13: gha gha gh'a ta ya sarba dusht'a ba ru n'a na sa pa ri w'a r'a na /
T02D1783:287a-14: k'i la ya k'i la ya h'um phat /
T02D1783:287a-16: aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na /
T02D1783:287a-17: gha gha gh'a ta ya sarba dushta ku be r'a na /
T02D1783:287a-18: sa pa ri w'a ra na /
T02D1783:287a-19: k'i la ya k'i la ya h'um phat /
T02D1783:287a-21: aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na /
T02D1783:287a-22: gha gha gh'a ta ya sarba dusht'agn'in sa pa ri
T02D1783:287a-23: w'a ra na k'i la ya k'i la ya h'um
T02D1783:287a-25: aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na /
T02D1783:287a-26: gha gha gh'a ta ya sarba dushta nee rri t'in sa pa ri w'a ra na /
T02D1783:287a-27: k'i la ya k'i la ya h'um phat /
T02D1783:287a-29: aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na /
T02D1783:287a-30: gha gha gh'a ta ya sarba dushta b'a y'un sa pa ri w'ar na /
T02D1783:287a-31: k'i la ya k'i la ya h'um phat /
T02D1783:287a-33: aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na /
T02D1783:287a-34: gha gha gh'a ta ya sarba du shta sh'an'an sa pa ri w'a ra na /
T02D1783:287a-35: k'i la ya k'i la ya h'um phat /
T02D1783:287a-37: / aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na /
T02D1783:287a-38: gha gha gh'a ta ya sarba dushta brahma na:/
T02D1783:287a-39: sa pa ri w'a ra na k'i la ya k'i la ya h'um phat /
T02D1783:287a-41: aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na /
T02D1783:287a-42: gha gha gh'a ta ya sarba dushta be ma tsi tri prithb'i de wa t'a /
T02D1783:287a-43: sa pa ri w'a ra na /
T02D1783:287a-44: k'i la ya k'i la ya h'um phat /
T02D1783:287a-46: de ltar phur bu brdungs pas bgegs med par shes
T02D1783:287a-47: nas gtum po'i dbang phyug mi snang bar byas te
T02D1783:287a-48: / slar yang rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid can
T02D1783:287a-49: du gyur pa'i mdun du rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil
T02D1783:287a-51: de la yam yig las byung ba'i rlung gi dkyil
T02D1783:287a-52: 'khor gzhu lta bu sngo bsangs ba dan gyis mtshan
T02D1783:287a-53: pa / de'i steng du ram yig las skyes pa'i
T02D1783:287a-54: me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum dmar po zur rnams su
T02D1783:287a-56: de'i steng du bam yig las skyes pa'i chu'i dkyil
T02D1783:287a-57: 'khor zlum po dkar po dbus su bum pas mtshan
T02D1783:287a-58: pa / de'i steng du lam yig las skyes pa'i
T02D1783:287a-59: sa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa ser po zur rnams
T02D1783:287a-60: su rtse gsum pa'i rdo rjes mtshan pa /
T02D1783:287a-61: de'i steng du sum yig las skyes pa'i ri rab rin po che bzhi'i rang bzhin bsams nas /
T02D1783:287a-62: de'i steng du nam mkha'i dbyings khyab pa'i chos 'byung
T02D1783:287a-63: dkar po'i snying por bhr'um ser po las skyes pa'i
T02D1783:287a-64: rdo rje'i khang pa brtsegs pa rten cing 'brel par
T02D1783:287a-65: 'byung ba / sems tsam shin tu rnam par dag
T02D1783:287b-0: pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsdus pa'i @287b rang bzhin
T02D1783:287b-1: 'byung ba / / thar pa chen pa'i grong khyer gru bzhi pa sgo bzhi pa /
T02D1783:287b-2: ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes pa /
T02D1783:287b-3: stegs bu bzhis yongs su bskor ba /
T02D1783:287b-4: rta babs bzhis brgyan pa rin po che'i do shal dang /
T02D1783:287b-8: dbyangs kyis shin tu mdzes par byas pa /
T02D1783:287b-13: seng ge la sogs pas mtshan pa rlung gis bskyod
T02D1783:287b-14: pa'i ba dan rnams kyis brgyan pa bsam par bya'o
T02D1783:287b-15: // de'i snying por pam las skyes pa'i sna tshogs padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i ze'u 'bru la /
T02D1783:287b-16: aam las skyes pa'i zla ba dang /
T02D1783:287b-17: ram las skyes pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng
T02D1783:287b-18: du h'um yig las skyes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1783:287b-19: mi bskyod pa m'a ma k'is yang dag par 'khyud
T02D1783:287b-20: pa bltas nas / de rnams rnal 'byor gyi dbang
T02D1783:287b-21: phyug mi bskyod pa'i mgo bo'i lam nas 'phos nas
T02D1783:287b-22: m'a ma k'i la rjes su chags par mdzad cing
T02D1783:287b-23: pa bltas nas / / 'dod chags chen pos zhu bar gyur pa /
T02D1783:287b-24: aa wa dh'u t'i khu ba mi bskyod pa rdo
T02D1783:287b-25: rje'i bu ga las lha mo'i padma'i khongs su lhung
T02D1783:287b-26: nas / padma'i bug pa'i nang du zhugs te /
T02D1783:287b-27: sku'i g-yas su h'um gis bon gyis brlabs pa de
T02D1783:287b-28: las yongs su grub pa'i mi g-yo ba'i gzugs kyis
T02D1783:287b-30: slar yang m'a ma k'i nyid la shin tu rjes
T02D1783:287b-31: su chags pas mi bskyod pa la thim par bsams
T02D1783:287b-32: la / m'a ma k'i yongs su gyur pa'i zhe
T02D1783:287b-33: sdang rdo rje ma la snyoms par zhugs pa 'chad
T02D1783:287b-36: dbyibs can dpal 'khor lo'i 'dren pa'i bdag nyid du blta'o zhes pa shin tu rnal 'byor ro //
T02D1783:287b-37: de ltar rnal 'byor gsum gyi bdag nyid can dang
T02D1783:287b-38: po sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang
T02D1783:287b-40: / de nas mi g-yo ba'i bdag nyid can gyi
T02D1783:287b-41: rnal 'byor ba'i shes rab zhe sdang rdo rje ma'i
T02D1783:287b-42: gzugs su bskyed pa de rigs lnga'i cha shas can
T02D1783:287b-43: du bya ba'i don du spyi bo dang /
T02D1783:287b-47: aom h'um sv'a a'a: h'a rnams go rims bzhin du 'khor lo dang /
T02D1783:287b-52: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa bon rnams la bkod la /
T02D1783:287b-53: de'i rjes su h'um dang a'a: dag las skyes pa'i rdo rje dang padma dag la /
T02D1783:287b-54: a'a: dang aom las skyes pa'i ze'u 'bru dang /
T02D1783:287b-55: rdo rje nor bu'i khar phat yig ser po rnam
T02D1783:287b-56: par bsgoms nas g-yon dang g-yas kyi yan lag tu
T02D1783:288a-1: dmar po rtse mor gnas pa'i mdzub mo dang lces kyang /
T02D1783:288a-2: sh'ita yig sngon du 'gro bas yang dag par bskyod nas /
T02D1783:288a-3: sh'i: sh'i:sh'i: aom sarba ta th'a ga t'a nu r'a ga na badzra sv'a bh'a wa a'atma konyaham /
T02D1783:288a-4: zhes brjod de dga' ba brtsam par bya'o //
T02D1783:288a-5: bde bas de kho na nyid kyi ye shes bskyed
T02D1783:288a-6: pa'i phyir rim pas de dang de nyid ji ltar
T02D1783:288a-7: skye ba yang dag par mtshon par bya'o //
T02D1783:288a-11: sen mo dang sos 'debs pa la sogs pa padma
T02D1783:288a-12: dang rdo rje yang dag par sbyor ba tsam las
T02D1783:288a-13: byung ba dga' ba 'char ba'i skad cig gi mtshan
T02D1783:288a-14: nyid kyi sems shes rab ma'i khar bzung nas ji
T02D1783:288a-15: ltar g-yo ba med pa yang dag par mtshon par
T02D1783:288a-16: bya'o // padma rdo rje'i shin tu drud pa las
T02D1783:288a-17: nor bu'i rtse mor gnas pa'i byang chub kyi sems
T02D1783:288a-18: las byung ba mchog tu dga' ba 'byung ba'i skad
T02D1783:288a-19: cig gi mtshan nyid kyi sems shes rab ma'i snying
T02D1783:288a-20: bya'o // ga dang / nu ma zung gi dbus
T02D1783:288a-21: su bzung nas ji lta ba bzhin du gzir zhing
T02D1783:288a-22: g-yo ba med pa srog rengs par yang dag par
T02D1783:288a-23: bya'o // ga dang / mtshon par bya'o // nor
T02D1783:288a-24: bu'i rtse mor bzhag pa'i byang chub kyi sems las
T02D1783:288a-26: lhan cig skyes pa 'char ba'i skad cig gi mtshan
T02D1783:288a-27: nyid rang dang gzhan du snang ba dang bral ba
T02D1783:288a-28: / byed pa thams cad las 'das pa /
T02D1783:288a-29: ngag gi rnam par rtog pa shin tu gnon pa'i rang bzhin /
T02D1783:288a-30: rang rig pa gcig pu'i mthar thug pa /
T02D1783:288a-32: chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin gyi sems shes rab ma'i bha ga'i nang du bzung nas /
T02D1783:288a-33: ji lta ba bzhin du ngal bso zhing g-yo ba
T02D1783:288a-34: med pa'i srog rengs pa yang dag par mtshon pa
T02D1783:288a-36: shin tu bde ba'i sku gsum po so sor thob par gyur pa yin no //
T02D1783:288a-37: myong zhing byang chub kyi sems g-yo ba med par
T02D1783:288a-38: gyur ba'i bde bdag gis zos so zhes bya ba
T02D1783:288a-39: yang dag par rig pa tsam khyad par gyi dga'
T02D1783:288a-40: ba 'char ba'i skad cig gi mtshan nyid kyi sems
T02D1783:288a-41: ji ltar g-yo ba ljang gu dbyung bar bya'o //
T02D1783:288a-42: mer dkar por snang ba'i gti mug rdo rje ma'o //
T02D1783:288a-43: bden bral du phra ma rdo rje ma gser lta bu'o //
T02D1783:288a-44: rlung du 'dod chags rdo rje ma dmar mo dbyung bar bya'o //
T02D1783:288a-45: dbang ldan du phrag dog rdo rje ma ljang gu
T02D1783:288a-46: dbyung bar bya'o zhes pa dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog
T02D1783:288a-47: ces bya ba ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa'o //
T02D1783:288a-48: de nas srid pa las shin tu 'das pa mchog
T02D1783:288a-49: gi bde ba chen po'i ros rang rig pa dang
T02D1783:288b-0: / lhan cig tu 'dod chags chen @288b po'i rjes
T02D1783:288b-1: su thig ler zhu bar gyur pa sa bon gyi
T02D1783:288b-2: gzugs kyis gnas par gyur to //
T02D1783:288b-4: shes rab dang bcas zhu ba rtsom //
T02D1783:288b-6: gti mug rdo rje ma la sogs pa rnams kyis
T02D1783:288b-7: rje po med par yang bltas nas bdag cag gi
T02D1783:288b-8: mgon med par gyur ro zhes bya ba ngo mtshar
T02D1783:288b-9: du gyur cing yid mi bde bar gyur te /
T02D1783:288b-10: rang gi sems sad par byed pa'i tshig le'ur byas
T02D1783:288b-11: pa'i rdo rje'i glu rnams kyis 'khor lo'i 'dren pa
T02D1783:288b-13: khyab bdag byams pa rnam spangs nas //
T02D1783:288b-14: stong pa'i rang bzhin du ma mdzad //
T02D1783:288b-15: khyod dang rnam bral bdag 'gum pas //
T02D1783:288b-16: 'gro kun stong par ma mdzad cig / gti mug rdo rje mas so //
T02D1783:288b-17: snying rje'i sems bral bdag 'gum pas //
T02D1783:288b-18: khyab bdag stong par ma mdzad cig / bdag gi lus 'di sdug bsngal bas //
T02D1783:288b-19: 'tsho ba dang bral ma mdzad cig / phra ma rdo rje mas so //
T02D1783:288b-20: ci ste mkhas pa khyod nyid ni //
T02D1783:288b-21: dga' ba spangs nas stong par 'jug /'jig rten ma lus pa rnams dang //
T02D1783:288b-22: bdag gi yid ni khyod la sdod //
T02D1783:288b-24: lang tsho dang ldan btang snyoms pa'i //
T02D1783:288b-25: mig ni stong pa 'bras med can //
T02D1783:288b-26: stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spongs la //
T02D1783:288b-27: bdag la mnyam nyid sbyor bar mdzod //
T02D1783:288b-28: phrag dog rdo rje mas so //
T02D1783:288b-29: de rnams kyis ni 'byed pa'i tshig / gsan nas rmi lam bzhin sad de //
T02D1783:288b-30: zhu ba'i gzugs las rab bzhangs nas //
T02D1783:288b-31: rang gi lha yi rnam par spros //
T02D1783:288b-32: de yang bcom ldan 'das sna tshogs padma'i lte bar
T02D1783:288b-33: zla ba dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su
T02D1783:288b-34: 'khyog po'i cha byad can g-yon gyi pus mos la
T02D1783:288b-35: btsugs pa / zhabs g-yas pa g-yas su stebs pa /
T02D1783:288b-36: lo bcu drug pa'i rnam par lang tsho gsar pa'i gzugs 'chang ba /
T02D1783:288b-37: sku mdog sngon po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
T02D1783:288b-38: phyag g-yas pas ral gi 'phyar ba /
T02D1783:288b-39: phyag g-yon pas sdigs mdzub dang ldan pa rdo rje zhags pa ser po thugs kar 'dzin pa /
T02D1783:288b-40: rnam par bkra ba'i na bza' can /
T02D1783:288b-41: rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa thugs kyi dbang pos mtshan pa'i cod pan dang /
T02D1783:288b-42: zur phud lnga dad rin po che'i cod pan can /
T02D1783:288b-44: bdud bzhi rnam par nyed par mdzad pa /
T02D1783:288b-45: 'khyog por gzigs pa'i spyan dmar ba 'jigs par mdzad pa'o //
T02D1783:288b-46: 'di'i shes rab ma zhe sdang rdo rje ma ni /
T02D1783:288b-47: sku mdog sngon mo gri gug dang thod pas mdzes pa'i phyag zung can /
T02D1783:288b-48: rnam par bkra ba'i gos dang /
T02D1783:289a-0: rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa bcom ldan 'das la @289a * //
T02D1783:289a-1: rjes su chags pa la brtson pa'o //
T02D1783:289a-2: mi g-yo ba dkar po la sogs pa'i dpa' bo
T02D1783:289a-3: thams cad ni 'khor lo'i dbang phyug lta bu dang
T02D1783:289a-4: / gti mug rdo rje la sogs pa'i dpa' mo
T02D1783:289a-5: rnams ni zhe sdang rdo rje ma dang 'dra bar
T02D1783:289a-6: / bsgom par bya'o // de ltar yongs su rdzogs
T02D1783:289a-7: pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i 'od zer gyi tshogs
T02D1783:289a-8: kyis nam mkha'i mthil khyab par bltas nas /
T02D1783:289a-11: skye mched rnams la nga rgyal bya'o //
T02D1783:289a-12: gzugs kyi phung po la rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D1783:289a-13: tshor ba'i phung po la rdo rje nyi ma'o //
T02D1783:289a-14: 'du shes kyi phung po la padma gar gyi dbang phyug go //
T02D1783:289a-15: 'du byed kyi phung po la rdo rje rgyal po'o //
T02D1783:289a-16: rnam par shes pa'i phung po la rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D1783:289a-17: mig dag la gti mug rdo rje ma /
T02D1783:289a-18: rna ba dag la zhe sdang rdo rje ma /
T02D1783:289a-19: sna dag la phrag dog rdo rje ma /
T02D1783:289a-20: kha dag la 'dod chags rdo rje ma /
T02D1783:289a-21: reg la phra ma rdo rje ma'o //
T02D1783:289a-22: sa'i khams ni ltung byed ma /
T02D1783:289a-23: chu'i khams ni gsod byed ma /
T02D1783:289a-25: rlung gi khams ni padma gar gyi dbang phyug ma /
T02D1783:289a-26: nam mkha'i khams ni padma'i dra ba can ma'o //
T02D1783:289a-31: de nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od
T02D1783:289a-32: zer rnams kyis ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor mdun du
T02D1783:289a-34: hroom zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags kyis bgegs thams cad bskrad la /
T02D1783:289a-35: mchod yon dang zhabs bsil la sogs pa phul nas mngon par mchod cing bstod de /
T02D1783:289a-36: aom shr'i tsanda ma h'a ro sha na /
T02D1783:289a-37: sa pa ri w'a ra sa hi ta a'a gatstsha gatstsha dza: h'um bam ho:/
T02D1783:289a-38: aa tra manda le aa dhishth'a nam ku ru h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1783:289a-39: zhes lan gsum brjod nas 'gugs pa la sogs pa rnams kyi ye shes dang /
T02D1783:289a-40: dam tshig sems dpa' bdag gcig nyid du rdzogs par byas te /
T02D1783:289a-41: lha'i nga rgyal byas pa'i snying ga'i 'od zer rnams
T02D1783:289a-42: kyis nam mkhar bkug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga
T02D1783:289a-43: dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa la
T02D1783:289a-44: / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag la dbang bskur du gsol zhes gsol ba btab pas /
T02D1783:289a-45: de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che rnam par rgyal
T02D1783:289a-46: ba'i bum pa phyag na bsnams pa de rnams kyis
T02D1783:289a-47: / ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D1783:289a-48: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs shing bdag nyid la dbang bskur bar blta'o //
T02D1783:289a-49: dbang bskur bzhin pa na lha'i dga' ston chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1783:289a-50: dzo dzo dzdzo ta rdo rje'i btsun mos rgyal ba 'khru //
T02D1783:289b-0: khro rnams phyogs @289b bcur rang gi sku yis gshegs //
T02D1783:289b-1: nam mkha'i mthil nas tsandan gur kum sogs //
T02D1783:289b-2: dri bzangs me tog mchog dang rin chen char //
T02D1783:289b-3: sil snyan gar bcas bstod dang bkra shis dang //
T02D1783:289b-4: rgyal sras tshogs bcas dga' mgu dga' ston nyid //
T02D1783:289b-5: thub dbang sku yi yon tan rin chen brgyan //
T02D1783:289b-6: mtha' yas rab 'byam khams rnams kun du'o //
T02D1783:289b-8: bcom ldan 'das la thugs kyi dbang pos rgyas gdab cing /
T02D1783:289b-9: de nyid kyis zhe sdang rdo rje ma la'o //
T02D1783:289b-10: mi g-yo ba dkar po la sogs pa'i dpa' bo rnams dang /
T02D1783:289b-11: gti mug rdo rje ma la sogs pa rtag pa dang /
T02D1783:289b-14: don yod grub pa rnams kyis so //
T02D1783:289b-15: de nas snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer rnams
T02D1783:289b-16: kyis sems can kyi khams ma lus pa yongs su
T02D1783:289b-17: smin par byas nas mi g-yo ba'i go 'phang la
T02D1783:289b-18: bkod de / slar yang 'od zer de rnams bsdus nas sa bon la thim par bsgom mo //
T02D1783:289b-19: de nas khams gsum pa mtha' dag dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rnam par lhag par mos par bya'o //
T02D1783:289b-20: 'khor lo'i dbang phyug kyang gti mug rdo rje ma'i
T02D1783:289b-21: yan lag dam pa la rjes su chags pas re
T02D1783:289b-22: zhig mi g-yo ba dkar po bdag nyid kyi spyi
T02D1783:289b-24: rang nyid mi g-yo ba dkar por gyur la /
T02D1783:289b-25: de bzhin kho nar bsdus nas zhes dang rdo rje
T02D1783:289b-26: ma yongs su gyur pa'i gti mug rdo rje ma
T02D1783:289b-27: la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o de bzhin du mi
T02D1783:289b-28: g-yo ba ser po la sogs pa so so'i rim
T02D1783:289b-29: pas bdag nyid la bsdus nas phra ma rdo rje
T02D1783:289b-30: ma la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma so so la
T02D1783:289b-32: phyi nas zhe sdang rdo rje ma la snyoms par
T02D1783:289b-33: zhugs pa'i dpal mi g-yo ba nag por gyur nas
T02D1783:289b-34: nga nyid mi g-yo bar grub pa'o zhes nga rgyal
T02D1783:289b-35: bya'o // rgyud du yang gsungs pa /
T02D1783:289b-36: lha mo bzhi la rjes chags pas /
T02D1783:289b-37: dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag bsdu //
T02D1783:289b-38: bdag nyid gcig bu'i kha sbyor du //
T02D1783:289b-39: brtul zhugs can gyis shin tu bsgom //
T02D1783:289b-40: zhes so zhes pa las kyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum pa'o /
T02D1783:289b-42: // / de ltar khams gsum po mtha' dag thabs dang
T02D1783:289b-43: shes rab kyi rang bzhin gyi gcig pu'i skur mngon
T02D1783:289b-44: par brtags la dam tshig ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D1783:289b-46: aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um phat /
T02D1783:289b-48: aom hr'am hr'im hroo tsandra ru ya /
T02D1783:289b-50: pra tsa ta pra tsa ta /
T02D1783:289b-52: pra spha ra pra spha ra /
T02D1783:289b-53: pra sph'a ra ya pra sph'a ra ya /
T02D1783:289b-57: dzam bha ya dzam bha ya /
T02D1783:289b-58: stam bha ya stam bha ya /
T02D1783:289b-59: mo ha ya mo ha ya /
T02D1783:290a-3: sarba d'a ki n'i n'am gra ha bh'u ta pi sh'a tsa by'a dhi yaksha nam /
T02D1783:290a-4: tra sa ya tra sa ya /
T02D1783:290a-6: m'a ra ya m'a ra ya /
T02D1783:290a-7: ru ru tsanda ru ka raksha raksha /
T02D1783:290a-10: sarba m'a dzny'a pa ya ya ti /
T02D1783:290a-11: aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um phat /
T02D1783:290a-12: phreng ba'i sngags so zhes pa sngags kyi bzlas pa'o //
T02D1783:290a-13: de nas zhe sdang rdo rje ma gri gug dang
T02D1783:290a-14: lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka'i sa
T02D1783:290a-15: bon la bcug nas sprul pa'i 'khor lor byung ste
T02D1783:290a-16: 'bar ba dang / gtum mo'i rtse mos rang rang
T02D1783:290a-17: gi 'khor lo dang lhan cig tu sprul pa'i 'khor
T02D1783:290a-18: lor gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rig ma dang
T02D1783:290a-19: 'bar ba dang / bcas pa dang / longs spyod
T02D1783:290a-20: rdzogs pa'i 'khor lor gnas pa'i a'a li dang k'a
T02D1783:290a-21: 'bar ba dang / bcas pa dang / li dang
T02D1783:290a-22: / bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor gnas pa'i ha
T02D1783:290a-23: yig kyang bsregs nas gzhom du med pa byang chub
T02D1783:290a-24: kyi sems ral gri'i mtshan ma yang bzung la thugs
T02D1783:290a-25: ka'i sa bon gyi nang du rnam par bsgom par
T02D1783:290a-26: 'bar ba dang / bcas pa dang / li dang
T02D1783:290a-27: / bya'o // sa bon de yang sangs rgyas lnga'i
T02D1783:290a-28: bdag nyid can 'bar bzhin par blta ste /
T02D1783:290a-29: slar yang h'um yig gi phrag dog gi rang bzhin a'u yig ni 'dod chags ha yig la dang /
T02D1783:290a-30: ha yig phra ma re kh'a la dang /
T02D1783:290a-31: re kh'a ni gti mug zla ba phyed pa la dang /
T02D1783:290a-32: zla ba phyed pa ni thig le zhe sdang la ste /
T02D1783:290a-33: thig le ni chos kyi dbyings n'a da la bsdus nas /
T02D1783:290a-34: de nas chos thams cad ro gcig pa'i rang bzhin /
T02D1783:290a-35: rtag pa dang chad pa dang dbus dang bral ba dang /
T02D1783:290a-36: thams cad la rab tu mi gnas pa bde ba
T02D1783:290a-37: chen po n'a da rnam par gnas par bya'o zhes
T02D1783:290a-38: bya ba phra mo'i rnal 'byor ro //
T02D1783:290a-39: slar yang smon lam gyis phug pa'i nus pa dang /
T02D1783:290a-40: gdul bya'i sems can gyi bsam pa'i dbang gis grub
T02D1783:290a-41: ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rnam par byung ba'i
T02D1783:290a-42: dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas par bltas
T02D1783:290a-43: nas mi g-yo ba lta bu'i rnal 'byor pas gtor
T02D1783:290a-44: ma'i de kho na nyid brtsam par bya'o //
T02D1783:290a-45: de la kham las byung ba'i snod la sogs pa
T02D1783:290a-46: bza' ba dang longs spyod pa la sogs pa khyad
T02D1783:290a-47: par can gyis gang ba mdun du bkod nas der
T02D1783:290a-48: yam las byung ba'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi steng
T02D1783:290a-49: du / ram las skyes pa'i me la aom a'a:
T02D1783:290a-50: h'um las byung ba'i mgo bo'i rnam pa'i sgyed pu
T02D1783:290a-51: gsum gyi steng du gnas pa'i aa yig las grub
T02D1783:290a-52: pa'i padma'i snod dkar po gang ba bhr'um a'am dzr'im
T02D1783:290a-53: kham h'um l'am m'am p'am t'am b'am las skyes pa
T02D1783:290a-54: bza' ba la sogs pa ji snyed pa cig tu
T02D1783:290a-55: bdud rtsi lnga dang sgron ma lnga'i rnam par grub
T02D1783:290a-56: du / pa la / sa bon de dag gis
T02D1783:290a-57: byin gyis brlabs pa me'i dkyil 'khor gyi shugs kyis
T02D1783:290b-0: 'bar zhing @290b 'bar bas gdungs pa zhu ste /
T02D1783:290b-1: nyi ma'i mdog tu bltas nas /
T02D1783:290b-2: de'i steng du h'um las skyes pa mtho gang tsam
T02D1783:290b-3: gyi tshad kyi yu ba'i rtse mor bdud rtsi'i rang
T02D1783:290b-5: de rlangs pas zhu zhing 'dres par gyur te /
T02D1783:290b-6: dngul chu lta bur bsil bar gyur bsams nas /
T02D1783:290b-7: de'i steng du de nyid gsum gyi 'od zer gyis
T02D1783:290b-8: phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i dpa' po dang dpa' bo'i
T02D1783:290b-9: dbang phyug ma rnams kyi ye shes kyi bdud rtsi
T02D1783:290b-10: bkug la de nyid du bcug nas /
T02D1783:290b-11: aom yig la sogs pa yang rim gyis zhu bar bltas te /
T02D1783:290b-12: de nyid gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D1783:290b-13: aom na mo bha ga wa te shr'i tsanda ma
T02D1783:290b-14: h'a ro sha n'a la de w'a su ra manu
T02D1783:290b-15: shrya tr'a sa n'a yas k'a la m'a ra wa
T02D1783:290b-16: la bi n'a sh'a n'a ya ratna mu ku ta
T02D1783:290b-17: kri ta shi ra se ai mi ba lim grihna
T02D1783:290b-18: grihna ma ma sarba bighnan ha ra ha ra tsa
T02D1783:290b-19: turm'a r'anni w'a ra ya ni war ya /
T02D1783:290b-25: sh'a t'a pa t'a pa sho sha sho sha /
T02D1783:290b-27: bhe da bhe da dushta satv'anma ma bi rudda tsitta
T02D1783:290b-28: kanbha shm'i ku ru ku ru h'um h'um phat phat
T02D1783:290b-29: sv'a h'a / zhes pa'i sngags 'dis bcom ldan 'das
T02D1783:290b-30: 'khor dang bcas pa la gtor ma dbul bar bya'o
T02D1783:290b-31: sv'a h'a / // de yang bcom ldan 'das 'khor
T02D1783:290b-32: dang bcas pa'i h'um rdo rje'i ljags kyi 'od zer
T02D1783:290b-33: gyi sbu gus drangs nas gsol zhing dgyes par ba
T02D1783:290b-34: sv'a h'a / // ltas nas / aom aa k'a
T02D1783:290b-35: ro mu kham zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags
T02D1783:290b-36: kyis tshim par byas nas zhal bsil la sogs ba
T02D1783:290b-37: sv'a h'a / // ltas nas / yang phul / mngon par mchod cing bstod do //
T02D1783:290b-38: yi ge brgya pa brjod pas bzod par gsol la
T02D1783:290b-39: gshegs su gsol lo zhes pa gtor ma'i cho ga'o
T02D1783:290b-40: // de ltar khams gsum po mtha' dag dkyil 'khor
T02D1783:290b-41: gyi 'khor lo'i bdag nyid can chu'i zla ba lta
T02D1783:290b-42: bur rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dbang po thams
T02D1783:290b-43: cad mi 'gog cing thams cad la mi gnas pa'i
T02D1783:290b-44: rnal 'byor gyis ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya'o
T02D1783:290b-46: mi g-yo'i bdag nyid de nyid shes /
T02D1783:290b-47: gang des ji lta de bzhin du //
T02D1783:290b-48: rnal 'byor pas ni nges med par //
T02D1783:290b-49: seng ge bzhin du kun du 'khyam //
T02D1783:290b-50: dag la mi gus 'gro la sngags //
T02D1783:290b-51: rang bzhin du snang mi g-yo 'dra //
T02D1783:290b-52: ma skyes chos kyi de nyid shes //
T02D1783:290b-53: snying rje'i longs spyod can du 'gyur //
T02D1783:290b-54: 'di na na bstan la gnod byed pa'i //
T02D1783:290b-55: gdug pa rnams ni mthar byed la //
T02D1783:290b-56: de rnams kyi ni rdzas phrogs nas //
T02D1783:290b-57: sems can rnams la phan par spyod //
T02D1783:290b-58: de phyir rtag tu bdag gzhan gyi //
T02D1783:290b-59: skyon ni brdzun gyis sgrib mi byed //
T02D1783:291a-1: bzhin du yang bdud rtsi lnga'i //
T02D1783:291a-2: dam tshig rnams ni sten par byed //
T02D1783:291a-3: bza' dang bza' min mi bya ste //
T02D1783:291a-4: bgrod dang bgrod min spang bar bya //
T02D1783:291a-5: bya dang bya min mi bya ste //
T02D1783:291a-6: btung dang btung min rnam spang bya //
T02D1783:291a-7: mgo bor rin chen cod pan te //
T02D1783:291a-8: rna ba dag la rna cha'o //
T02D1783:291a-9: rkang pa dag la gdu bu ste //
T02D1783:291a-10: de bzhin rked par ska rags so //
T02D1783:291a-11: de yang dpal ldan mi g-yo'i bdag / sna tshogs rin chen gyis brgyan pa //
T02D1783:291a-12: g-yas ba'i phyag gis ral gri ste //
T02D1783:291a-13: g-yon pas zhags pa gzung bya ba //
T02D1783:291a-14: btang nas gri gug thod par yang //
T02D1783:291a-15: byas nas rin chen gyis ni brgyan //
T02D1783:291a-16: nyi shu lon pa'i shes rab kyi //
T02D1783:291a-17: bde bas mi g-yo bsgrub par bya //
T02D1783:291a-18: de nyid gsum gyis byin brlabs pa'i //
T02D1783:291a-19: bza' dang ston mo sogs bsgrubs pa //
T02D1783:291a-20: bla ma 'dod lha la sogs la //
T02D1783:291a-21: mgos btud seng ge rgyu zhing gnas //
T02D1783:291a-22: 'od gsal ba la snyoms zhugs shid //
T02D1783:291a-23: mnyam par bzhag pas 'gro bar bya //
T02D1783:291a-24: glu rnams kyis ni bskul ba las //
T02D1783:291a-25: rab tu sang pas yang dag bzhengs //
T02D1783:291a-26: rnam par mi rtog bdag nyid can //
T02D1783:291a-27: gsang spyod rab sbyor gyis grub 'gyur //
T02D1783:291a-29: mi shes dbang gis nye bar bsten pa'am //
T02D1783:291a-30: brjed ngas skyon las rab skyes 'di yi gzhung //
T02D1783:291a-31: byas gang de la dpal ldan rdo rje yi //
T02D1783:291a-32: mkha' 'gro'i tshogs bcas khyed rnams bzod par mdzod //
T02D1783:291a-33: sdom brtson nags kyi rin chen gyis 'dir mi g-yo'i mngon rtogs kyi //
T02D1783:291a-34: skyon med gzhung ni dang por sarba mi tras gsol btab cing //
T02D1783:291a-35: dam pa gzhan gyis kyang bskul legs byas gang des
T02D1783:291a-36: mi g-yo mchog / mngon par shes par drug rnams
T02D1783:291a-37: skye ba 'di nyid la gyur cig / ces pa
T02D1783:291a-38: mi g-yo ba'i mngon par rtogs pa rab tu dga'
T02D1783:291a-39: bar mngon par brjod pa rdzogs so /
T02D1783:291a-41: // / slob dpon dpal nags kyi rin chen gyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa'o //
T02D1783:291a-42: 'di ni lho phyogs kyi sa'i thig ler blo gros chen po can /
T02D1783:291a-43: dpal aa mo gha siddhi zhes bya bas /
T02D1783:291a-44: dpal kun du bzang po'i nags kyi grub ba'i ring
T02D1783:291a-45: lugs pa chen po zab pa dang rgya che ba'i
T02D1783:291a-46: gzhung lugs thams cad pa a'a nanda s'a dhu'i zhabs
T02D1783:291a-47: kyi drung du gsol ba btab ste /
T02D1783:291a-48: de nyid kyis ja'i gnang sbyin bzang po dang bcas pa'i bka' gnang ba las /
